retweeted_status.text: ONE MONTH TO GO! The 2017 Made In Rochester Game Festival will take over the @IronLibrary on September 30!

user.name: ROC Game Fest
user.description: #ROCGameFest, the #ROC area’s only dedicated game convention, will be back this Fall. Celebrating locally-made games with support from @RITMAGIC + @IronLibrary.
